SELECT SUM(`roleLogins`) AS roleLogins, SUM(`activeRoles3`) AS activeRoles3, SUM(`roles`) AS roles, SUM(`amount`) AS amount, SUM(`payTimes`) AS payTimes, SUM(`s1`) AS s1, SUM(`s2`) AS s2, SUM(`s3`) AS s3, SUM(`s4`) AS s4, SUM(`s5`) AS s5, SUM(`s6`) AS s6, SUM(`s7`) AS s7, SUM(`s8`) AS s8, SUM(`s9`) AS s9, SUM(`s10`) AS s10, `statDate` FROM s_recharge_distribute_daily WHERE gameId = #gameId#
AND `platformId`=#platformId#
AND `zoneId`=#zoneId#
AND `statDate`>=#startDate#
AND `statDate`<=#endDate#
GROUP BY `statDate` ORDER BY `statDate` ASC
